reaction.def: UDP-glucuronate + NAD+ <=> UDP-L-Ara4O + CO2 + NADH + H+

pathway.data: Amino sugar and nucleotide sugar metabolism

module.data: Undecaprenylphosphate alpha-L-Ara4N biosynthesis, UDP-GlcA => undecaprenyl phosphate alpha-L-Ara4N

orthology.KO:terms: UDP-4-amino-4-deoxy-L-arabinose formyltransferase / UDP-glucuronic acid dehydrogenase (UDP-4-keto-hexauronic acid decarboxylating)
